description: This fruity no-churn ice cream is homemade without the hassle.
keywords: Sundae,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: No-Churn Blackberry Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the blackberries, lemon juice and zest in saucepan on medium heat, add a couple of tablespoons of water and gently cook down for 6-8 minutes. Remove from the heat and set aside to cool completely.
Strain the blackberry mix into a bowl so you have a smooth puree.
Whisk the double cream and condensed milk in a large bowl using a hand held mixer until thick and fluffy. Gently fold in the vanilla and blackberry mix using a spatula.
Pour the mix into a freezer proof container and freeze for 6-8 hours.
